name: Wildlife Park 3 - Down Under
detailed_description:
An adventure trip to Down Under!


Visit the home of koalas and kangaroos. From the Great Barrier Reef to the outback, the Aboriginal homeland of Australia.
The continent offers a wide range of fauna and flora: Kangaroos, koalas, emus-and of course - the tousled wombat and the strange platypus, the "landmarks " from Down Under.


Keep sea creatures like sharks, dwarf saw rays, dolphins and wall reef turtles as well as reptiles like the perentie and the freshwater crocodiles. In the australian wildlife you will also find birds like cormorants and eyeglasses pelicans as well as the colourful helmet cassowary, a primevally maddish bird. Wildlife Park's flora is expanded with 'Down under' around Australia's typical eucalyptus trees.


For visitors to your Australian wildlife Park, you'll have a variety of new service facilities from Shark Trashcan to Infodoos, a Sydney Opera Restaurant, Outback Toilets to tourist attractions such as Submarine Diving on the Great Barrier Reef and Helicopter Tours available. Lastly, you decorate your 'Down Under' Park with many typical decorations such as didgeridoos, surfboards and the famous Ayers Rock.

"Down Under"-Features:
20 autralische Land- und Wasserierarten wie z.B. Kanguruhs, Koalas, Emus, Wombats, Krokodile, Delfine und natürlich Haie.
3 Themenpark-Attraktionen, u.a. UBoot-Tauchen am Great Barrier
10 Besuchereinrichtungen wie das Sydney-Opera-Restaurant und Outback-Toiletten
7 Dekorationen mit verschiedenen Variationen wie Ayersrock, Digeridoos, Boomerang- und Surfboard-Schilder
2 Eukalyptus-Baumarten

short_description: An adventure trip to "Down Under"! The continent offers a wide range of the fauna and flora: kangaroos, koalas, emus and - of course - the cute wombat and the weird platpyus, the trademarks of down under.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian, Czech, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7/VISTA/2000/XP
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel Pentium® D, AMD Athlon™64 3000+
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10/8/7/VISTA/2000/XP
  • Processor: Dualcore CPU (Intel E4300, AMD Athlon™ X2 3800+)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTX, ATI Radeon 3870 or better
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
